treatment.description: Intricately branching and forking, prostrate; primocanes at first erect and strongly angled, soon becoming prostrate and subterete; these and floricanes bearing straight horizontally divergent broad-based subulate hard prickles 4-6 mm. long; terminal glabrate leaflets or simple bracts narrowly ovate and gradually tapering to acuminate tips; corymbs 3-5-flowered, the minutely pilose sparsely prickly erect pedicels 3-4 cm. long at anthesis; fresh petals roseate, 1.3 cm. long, 9 mm. wide.
